-CodeValue[x]
*Conclusion textBased on the genotype result, this patient is predicted to have a CYP2C19 poor metabolizer phenotype. This genotype information can be used by patients and clinicians as part of the shared decision-making process for several drugs metabolized by CYP2C19 including clopidogrel, voriconazole, amitriptyline, citalopram and escitalopram.
